title: How to Make Coffee Cake Muffins

steps.headline: Mix the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a medium size bowl.
Put the brown sugar, cinnamon, and bran flakes in a bowl and crush slightly.
In a separate large bowl, beat the next 3 ingredients until light.
Mix in 1/3 of the flour mixture into the wet mixture until blended lightly.
Add in 1/2 of the sour milk mixture.
Add the rest of the sour milk mixture.
Put the rest of the flour mixture into the batter mix only till blended smoothly.
Fill the muffin tins only 1/4 to 1/2 way full depending on how big they are.
Taking half the brown sugar mixture, sprinkle about 3/4 of a teaspoon and sprinkle it into the muffins.
steps.description: Do NOT pat it down as it will cause the muffins to become dense.

steps.headline: Fill the muffins tin up most of the way because they will not rise too much.
Sprinkle the remaining brown sugar mixture on the top of all the muffins and place in the oven for 25-30 minutes.

text: Preheat oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Mix the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a medium size bowl.  Put the brown sugar, cinnamon, and bran flakes in a bowl and crush slightly. Set aside for later. In a separate large bowl, beat the next 3 ingredients until light.  Mix in 1/3 of the flour mixture into the wet mixture until blended lightly.  Add in 1/2 of the sour milk mixture.  Mix in the second 1/3 lightly.  Add the rest of the sour milk mixture.  Put the rest of the flour mixture into the batter mix only till blended smoothly.  Fill the muffin tins only 1/4 to 1/2 way full depending on how big they are.  Taking half the brown sugar mixture, sprinkle about 3/4 of a teaspoon and sprinkle it into the muffins. Do NOT pat it down as it will cause the muffins to become dense. Fill the muffins tin up most of the way because they will not rise too much.  Sprinkle the remaining brown sugar mixture on the top of all the muffins and place in the oven for 25-30 minutes.
